tag_list: robert, matuszewski, get10, east-west-access, ewa, rem, rewm-international, r2, r2-innovations
overview:
Founder and CEO of Get10, LLC. Robert Matuszewski, is a successful entrepreneur and consultant with seventeen-plus years experience in Retail and F&B systems implementation and high volume operations with more than nine-years of experience in product development, global manufacturing and international trade.

Robert has served as President, CEO and Senior Executive of a multitude of high volume F&B and Retail operations including REM International, R2 Innovations, Show-Biz USA, Jimmy John’s, Inc. and Denver based FeelGood Catalog.

Robert has spent the last nine years consulting and procuring strategic partnerships throughout Asia and the USA for various products and industries, including food and beverage packaging, high definition, lenticular printing, print-packaging, CR80 Card Manufacturing, RFID/NFC integrated biometric devices, Point of Purchase displays, LED Components, Specialty Mechanical and various Composite Mold products.

With a focus on product development and manufacturing integration, Robert specializes in bringing products to market domestically and abroad through a system of proven steps, procedures and a sense of urgency approach towards production manufacturing and attention to detail.

Specialties: Loyalty driven solutions, advertising and marketing, retail, food and beverage product development, F&B systems, process and systems management. International trade, manufacturing and sourcing.
